mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(ord_dtm) AS year, MONTH(ord_dtm) AS month, COUNT(*) AS total_count, SUM(tot_amount) as tot_amt FROM order_mst where 1=1 and ord_dtm LIKE CONCAT(#{year}, '%') GROUP BY year, month;

SELECT YEAR(ord_dtm) AS year, MONTH(ord_dtm) AS month, DATE(ord_dtm) AS dt, COUNT(*) AS total_count, SUM(tot_amount) as tot_amt FROM order_mst where 1=1 and ord_dtm LIKE CONCAT(#{month}, '%') GROUP BY year, month, dt;
